events.comment:
For this part of the code, we have installed the Read Pixels extension into the project.
Which allow to read the color of a pixel at a given position.
Quit the DipStick mode after has picked a color
Set Brush color to the color given by user if eraser is not active
Draw circles and fill in the spaces between each circle with lines to make a smooth free form line
Please note that for correct drawing you need to install the Sprite Snapshot extension to the project.
Hide the color selcetion box if the variable ColorSelectionOpen is false. This variable determines if the box should be visible
Toggle between Eraser being Activated and Disabled. Variable EraserOn determines if the eraser is on
Preset colors
Hide or SHow the toolbar

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Tristan Rhodes (https://victrisgames.itch.io/), D8H
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
This extension provides a behavior that draws a horizontal slider that can be dragged by the users. The value range and the tick spacing can be defined with properties.
Note that this behavior can only be attached to a **Shape Painter** object.

Further details can be found in [this tutorial video](https://youtu.be/iiTUwdAT_hs).
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: DraggableSliderControl
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: A horizontal slider that can be dragged by the users.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description:
Draw a horizontal slider that can be dragged by the users. 

The value range and the tick spacing can be defined with properties.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: DraggableSliderControl

events.comment: Move slider when being dragged
End sliding and update variables
Update "Value" based on the location of the thumb
Detect hover/touch/click (but only if the layer and object is visible, and the object is not already being dragged)
Detect mouse clicks near track, start dragging
Detect when the mouse is hovering over thumb
Use a more opaque halo while being dragged
Set inactive track parameters (by default, use thumb color)
Draw half circle at end (optional)
Draw inactive track
Set active track parameters (by default, use thumb color)
Draw half circle at end (optional)
Draw active track (2 pixels bigger than property)
Prepare thumb settings
Draw Circle thumb
Draw Rectangle thumb

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the slider is being dragged.
eventsFunctions.name: IsBeingDragged
eventsFunctions.sentence: Slider _PARAM0_ is being dragged using the _PARAM1_ behavior

events.comment: Make sure object doesn't get re-drawn every frame
Make sure thumb width is not smaller than track height (to prevent track ends from showing)

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @Bouh
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
This extension allow to read pixels on screen.

| Expression | Argument  | Type returned |
|--|--|--|
|  ReadPixelRed(x, y)  | position x: number, position y: number | number (0-255) |
|  ReadPixelGreen(x, y)  | position x: number, position  y: number | number (0-255) |
|  ReadPixelBlue(x, y)  | position x: number, position y: number | number (0-255) |
|  ReadPixelAlpha(x, y)  | position x: number, position y: number | number (0-255) |
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: ReadPixels
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Read the values of pixels on the screen.

eventsFunctions.description: Return the alpha component of the pixel at the specified position.
eventsFunctions.name: ReadPixelAlpha

eventsFunctions.description: Return the blue component of the pixel at the specified position.
eventsFunctions.name: ReadPixelBlue

eventsFunctions.description: Return the green component of the pixel at the specified position.
eventsFunctions.name: ReadPixelGreen

eventsFunctions.description: Return the red component of the pixel at the specified position.
eventsFunctions.name: ReadPixelRed

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Arthur Pacaud (arthuro555)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
Allows rendering (creating an image) of objects, layers and the scene to display in a sprite. 
This allows to make optimizations by transforming the resulting image of a shape painter into a faster sprite, or to make viewports/cameras.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: RenderToSprite
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Renders an object, layer or scene and puts the resulting image into a sprite

eventsFunctions.description: Renders an object and puts the rendered image into a sprite object
eventsFunctions.fullName: Render an object into a sprite
eventsFunctions.name: RenderObject

eventsFunctions.description: Renders a layer and puts the rendered image into a sprite object
eventsFunctions.fullName: Render a layer into a sprite
eventsFunctions.name: RenderLayer

eventsFunctions.description: Renders the scene and puts the rendered image into a sprite object
eventsFunctions.fullName: Render the scene into a sprite
eventsFunctions.name: RenderScene
eventsFunctions.sentence: Render the current scene into sprite _PARAM1_
